DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to investigate the effects of altering the wheelchair set-up on mobility and safety by changing the rear-axle position on a manual wheelchair.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Axle Positions on Wheelchair Skills in Manual Wheelchair Users
DOC.criteria: manual wheelchair users minimum of 17 years of age at least one week experience in a manual wheelchair, for at least an hour a day alert able to answer questions able to fit in the testing wheelchairs permission to participate from the attending physician significant visual impairments unstable medical conditions (e.g., angina) emotional/psychological problems that may make testing unpleasant
